title: Jess Brammar – 2021 Comments on the Conduct of Kemi Badenoch
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jess Brammar, the editor of the Huffington Post UK, on 29 January 2021.
content: Hi Kemi, I am Nadine’s editor. The correspondence you have published here shows the opposite of spreading disinformation – as you know, it is correct and standard practice for journalists to check facts and approach people in public office for comment.

I’m glad you highlighted our work on how Covid has hit Black people in the UK, much of which has been done by Nadine Writes. You will note that, contrary to your claim we were spreading disinformation, we have not published this story without your response.
